author: Henry Martin
title: Steelers make a powerful move by signing Esezi Otomewo to one-year contract as team aims to unleash untapped potential in defensive line
text:
Significant Signing
The Pittsburgh Steelers have finalized a one-year contract with defensive tackle Esezi Otomewo, marking a notable addition to the team’s defensive line strategy. This move represents a focused effort to enhance performance and shore up a critical component of the defense.
Contract Details
Esezi Otomewo’s agreement underlines the team’s willingness to invest in promising talent. The one-year deal reflects both the immediate needs of the Steelers and the opportunity to evaluate his integration into the defensive scheme throughout the season.
Unleashing Potential
The acquisition centers on utilizing untapped potential. Esezi Otomewo is seen as a player who can bring fresh energy and resilience to a defensive front looking for continuous improvement. His skill set and athleticism offer the prospect of evolving into a reliable asset within the highly competitive league.
Future Prospects
By signing Otomewo, the Steelers demonstrate their commitment to innovation and reinvention on the field. The focus on nurturing emerging talent is anticipated to boost the unit’s overall effectiveness, contributing to a more robust defense and a broader strategy aimed at achieving long-term success.

author: Redacción
title: 'Viernes infernal' en CDMX: decretan alerta naranja en 10 alcaldías por 'calorón' de 33 grados | Radio Fórmula
text: [La Secretaría de Gestión Integral de Riesgos y Protección Civil (SGIRPC)](https://www.radioformula.com.mx/cdmx/2024/2/11/cdmx-se-reseca-ya-se-asoman-las-olas-de-calor-contingencias-801610.html) emitió una alerta naranja en 10 alcaldías de la CDMX, para mañana viernes 22 de marzo, entre las 13:00 y 17:00 horas. Asimismo, cuatro alcaldías de la capital del país tienen alerta amarilla por temperaturas máximas que alcanzarán los 30 grados. Protección Civil de la Ciudad de México ofreció un par de números para reportar emergencias ante las altas temperaturas que se presentarán mañana: 911 ó 55 5683 2222. Le piden a las personas no permanecer durante un tiempo prolongado a la luz del sol, debido a que pueden sufrir un golpe de calor o sufrir quemaduras ante los altos niveles de radiación. ¿En qué alcaldías habrá alerta naranja durante el viernes 22 de marzo? Entre las 13:00 y 17:00 horas del viernes 22 de marzo, habrá alerta naranja en las siguientes alcaldías de la CDMX: - Azcapotzalco. - Benito Juárez. - Coyoacán. - Cuauhtémoc. - Gustavo A. Madero. - Iztacalco. - Iztapalapa. - Miguel Hidalgo. - Tlalpan. - Venustiano Carranza. Asimismo, en al menos cuatro alcaldías se decretó alerta amarilla por temperaturas máximas que irán de los 28 a los 30 grados: - Álvaro Obregón. - Magdalena Contreras. - Tláhuac. - Xochimilco. Entre las recomendaciones que ofrece Protección Civil de la CDMX ante la altas temperaturas son: usar bloqueador solar (mínimo FPS 50), vestir ropa de colores claros, usar gafas de sol, no realizar actividades intensas bajo los rayos solares, evitar comer en la vía pública "ya que los alimentos se descomponen rápidamente". ¿Cuál será el clima en la CDMX durante el viernes 22 de marzo? De acuerdo con el Servicio Meteorológico Nacional (SMN), el clima en la CDMX durante el viernes 22 de marzo será el siguiente: el ambiente será fresco y templado al amanecer; por la tarde, el ambiente será despejado y no hay probabilidad de lluvias en las 16 alcaldías de la CDMX ni en los municipios del Edomex. La temperatura mínima será de 14 grados y la temperatura máxima promedio será de 31 grados; las ráfagas de viento alcanzarán los 50 kilómetros por hora y no se descarta la formación de tolvaneras en la capital del país.

author: Dec ; A Falun Dafa Practitioner
title: Realizing the Seriousness of Writing a “Solemn Statement” and Continuing Cultivation | Falun Dafa - Minghui.org
text: (Minghui.org) The Minghui website recently published news that some practitioners in Guiyang City, Guizhou Province, had been arrested, harassed and detained for publishing “solemn statements.” My heart felt heavy when I read this. I wondered if the police had dared to do this because of loopholes in these practitioners’ cultivation. Master Li (the founder of Falun Dafa) said, “... everything that happens today in the ordinary society is the result of Dafa disciples’ thoughts.” (“ [Fa Teaching Given at the 2002 Conference in Philadelphia, U.S.A.](https://falundafa.org/eng/eng/lectures/20021130L.html),” Collected Teachings Given Around the World, Volume II) After the sharing “ [The Importance of Issuing a Solemn Statement](https://en.minghui.org/html/articles/2022/5/22/201439.html)” was published on Minghui website last year, I noticed the volume of solemn statements increased. This is a good thing, because it indicates that more former practitioners have returned to their cultivation path. The opportunity to write a solemn statement is another chance for practitioners who didn’t do well, and shows Master’s great benevolence. As stated in the sharing, “We must take the solemn statement seriously and not take Master’s mercy for granted. We should avoid making the same mistake of renouncing our faith under pressure again and again.” Some practitioners resumed cultivation and have done well. However, others have not done well. They made the same mistake over and over again and had to write solemn statements over and over again. Isn’t this a reflection of loopholes in cultivation that can be taken advantage of by the evil? Recently, many of us watched the film “Once We Were Divine.” The film showed the horrific scene that occurs when Dafa disciples’ righteous thoughts falter, which brings disaster to all sentient beings in our own heaven. However, when the King of Light refused to give in to the evil, his entire heavenly world returned to light. This reminded me of what Master taught us, “Once a vow is signed, it must be fulfilled!” (“ [Cultivation in Dafa Is Serious](https://en.minghui.org/html/articles/2023/9/2/211137.html)”) Cultivation in Dafa is serious. If one makes the same mistake over and over again, it discredits Master and Dafa. It is also a stain on one’s cultivation. In order to do the [three things] well and cultivate ourselves well, we must study the [Fa] well. In particular, practitioners who suffered persecution and later wrote a solemn statement, should not be in a hurry to get involved in Dafa activities. Instead they should study the Fa with a calm mind and search within for any gaps in their cultivation that led to their persecution. Only by truly improving in the Fa and cultivating oneself, can one do the three things well. We once vowed to come down to this world together to assist Master in Fa-rectification, so we can return to Heaven together. Dafa disciples―we must fulfill our vows! Note: This article only represents the author’s current understanding meant for sharing among practitioners so that we can “Compare with one another in study, in cultivation.” (“Solid Cultivation,” [Hong Yin](https://en.falundafa.org/eng/hongyin/v3/hy.htm#20)) Copyright © 2023 Minghui.org. All rights reserved.

author: GB Times
title: Why has my Netflix changed language?
text:
Why has my Netflix changed language?
Netflix is a popular streaming service that has gained a massive following worldwide. Its extensive library of content is easily accessible in multiple languages, which can be a major draw for many subscribers. However, some users have reported finding their Netflix account changed language unexpectedly, making it difficult to navigate and enjoy the platform as usual. In this article, we will delve into the reasons behind this phenomenon, along with some troubleshooting steps and language change methods.
Why has your Netflix account changed language?
There are several possible reasons why your Netflix account may have changed language without your consent. Here are a few explanations:
Language set in your device’s settings: By default, many devices, including smartphones and computers, automatically detect the language based on their location or the device settings. If your device is set to a specific language, it may override the language selection in Netflix.
Region switch: Netflix is available in several countries with different language options. If you changed your region or location, Netflix might switch to the language associated with your new location.
Profile or username: Each Netflix profile has a specific language setting. If you have created a new profile or changed your username, it might have reset the language.
Device compatibility issues: Different devices, such as smart TVs or Blu-ray players, may have specific issues with language settings or configurations. These issues can cause language settings to be overridden or changed unexpectedly.

How to troubleshoot Netflix language change issues Language change methods for Netflix Closing thoughts How to troubleshoot Netflix language change issues
When faced with a Netflix language change issue, try these troubleshooting steps:
Restart your device: Sometimes, simple devices may need a reboot to revert back to the original language settings. Log out of Netflix, restart your device, and then log back in.
Change language settings: Go to the account profile dropdown menu and select Setting > Language . Switch back to your preferred language or one you are familiar with.
Verify device settings: Check the language settings on your device (Settings > Language) and see if it matches the language you want in Netflix. Adjust the device language as necessary.
Check your account setting: Verify that your account setting and login credentials are correct, especially if you have multiple profiles or have tried using a different login.

Language change methods for Netflix
If you still encounter language-related issues after troubleshooting, you can try using one of the following methods:
Automatic Language Detection: Netflix uses intelligent language detection to adjust the language based on the audio or subtitles of the content being viewed. Try enabling Automatic Language Detection : Go to Setting > Sound and toggle on Subtitles and Audio Language : to enable automatic language detection for movies and TV shows.
Add Language Option: If the auto-detection feature doesn’t work as desired, add a language option for subtitles and audio : Go to Setting > Sound and toggle off Automatic Language Detection . This allows you to manually select the language or caption settings for individual content.
If the language change issue is not resolved using the above troubleshooting methods or language change options, you can attempt the following:
Contact Netflix Customer Support: Reach out to the Netflix Help Center ( https://help.netflix.com/en-contactus ) or contact a live representative through phone. Explain the issue and provide your profile name, device information, and date of the language change.
System check: If the issue is persisted, it might be related to your TV’s settings or software. Check the Netgear support page or device documentation for specific troubleshooting guides relevant to your device.
Closing thoughts
For some users, Netflix may inexplicably change language settings due to various reasons, including device compatibility or changes to account settings. By understanding possible reasons for language changes and attempting some basic troubleshooting steps, you should be able to revert back to your preferred language option.
If the issue persists, utilize language change methods, and ensure the device settings and automatic language detection are configured correctly. It’s also essential to contact Netflix Support or check the device manufacturer support for assistance.

author: The Petoskey News-Review - Unlimited Digital Access
title: Hastings: Let the light shine
text: Hastings: Let the light shine “Your light must shine before others so that they may see your good acts and give praise to your Abba God in heaven.” — Matthew 5:16 The Inclusive Bible After celebrating light in the darkest season of the year, many places still need a shining light. One of those places is our country’s mass incarceration system. Our country has 5% of the earth’s people but 20% of earth’s prisoners. There has been a 500% increase in incarceration, mostly Black and Brown, and an 800% increase in women’s incarceration, even though crime rates are down. This has occurred since the 1970s when state hospitals were closed. For most health crises people are taken to a health care facility. For brain health crises, people are taken to prisons which are not equipped for brain health care — or for rehabilitation and restoration of people to the communities where they will someday be our co-workers and neighbors. Norway is one country shining a light in this realm of darkness, reducing recidivism rates. The Norwegian model focuses on rehabilitation and job training and second chances. This approach creates a less-hostile, more community-based environment for people serving time as well as staff. The mutual goal is to better help incarcerated people reintegrate into society. Several states are already looking to the Norwegian model, re-purposing a factory into a center for innovation, providing social services and breaking cycles of crime. Many charities are operating housing facilities for those released from prison to help rebuild lives. The light of justice has a ripple effect as community by community, a grassroots movement grows until it becomes the norm. Of those who are building new systems of justice, Jesus says, “Those who are just will shine like the sun ... in the kindom of their Abba God.”* So let the light shine! *Matthew 13:43 The Inclusive Bible The Rev. Celia M. Hastings has a master’s degree in religious education from Western Theological Seminary in Holland. She is author of “The Wisdom Series” and “The Undertaker’s Wife.”

NASCAR legend Kurt Busch ‘puts in the work’ ahead of his racing return at ROC Discuss Now NASCAR: Cup Practice & Qualifying - Source: Imagn Legendary NASCAR driver Kurt Busch was recently seen preparing for the 2025 Race of Champions set to be held in Sydney, Australia between March 7-8, in an Instagram post by Apex Motor Club.
Kurt Busch will be making this first competitive appearance since retiring from NASCAR following a serious concussion sustained during a qualifying crash at Pocono Raceway in 2022. The Nevada native will be representing Team USA at this year’s ROC, where he will be partnering with freestyle motocross icon Travis Pastrana, who is also an 11-time X Games gold medalist and six-time Rally America champion.
The race will be held at Accor Stadium, where it will be the first time that an event like this will be held in the Southern Hemisphere. Other notable drivers who will be participating are Sebastian Vettel (4-time Formula 1 champion), Mick Schumacher (2020 F2 Champion), Jamie Whincup (7-time V8 Supercar Champion), and Sébastien Loeb (9-time World Rally Champion).
Trending Kurt Busch was seen with Apex Motor Club AZ preparing for the ROC 2025 on Instagram in a post that read:
"Happy to have @kurtbusch putting in the work for ROC where he’ll be representing the US in Sydney, Australia. #apexmotorclubaz #membershiphasitsprivileges #findyourapex " Kurt Busch was born in Las Vegas, Nevada, and is the elder brother of 2-time Cup Series Champion Kyle Busch. The elder Busch sibling started his career in NASCAR in 2000 and made a name for himself, becoming the NASCAR Cup Series champion in 2004, where he became the inaugural champion of the controversial NASCAR playoff format.
Over his storied career, he secured 34 wins in the Cup Series including a victory at the prestigious “Great American Race” - the Daytona 500 in 2017. Apart from his NASCAR career, the 46-year-old has participated in the Indianapolis 500 and the Rolex 24 at Daytona.

author: Tremending
title: La respuesta de Willy Toledo a Carmen Maura tras criticar "el feminismo de ahora" | Tremending
text: "Hay una cosa que no me gusta. Nos están tomando manía los chicos. Este feminismo de ahora atacando a los hombres no me parece buena política". Estas son las palabras con las que la actriz Carmen Maura ha cargado contra el movimiento feminista en el programa de RTVE No sé de qué me hablas. Relacionada: Las polémicas declaraciones de Carmen Maura sobre el feminismo que han incendiado las redes: "Ya es hora de que las mujeres empecemos a relajarnos" Pero esto no es todo. La actriz contestaba a las preguntas de la periodista Mercedes Milá cuando también ha deslizado el bulo machista de las denuncias falsas en casos de violencia de género: "Yo conozco casos muy cercanos de hombres que han sido acusados de violencia y que no era cierta", apuntaba Maura. Sin embargo, el porcentaje de denuncias falsas sobre el total en estos casos es de 0,01%, según el último informe de la Fiscalía. Discursos que no tienen ni medio centímetro de profundidad intelectual más allá de repetir el “yo no soy de esas” para intentar no sentir el rechazo masculino. Casualmente estos discursos de “antipatía feminista” vienen de mujeres blancas y burguesas. pic.twitter.com\/8MwtuspB8r — Olympe Abogados (@olympeabogados) December 23, 2023 Entre ambas intervenciones, Milá dio paso a su compañera y también conductora del espacio, Inés Hernand, que rebatió las palabras de Maura: "Las políticas feministas no pretenden que esto sea una guerra de sexos ni muchísimo menos. A un hombre feminista le empoderan también. ¿Quién no va a querer igualdad de condiciones?", espetaba la comunicadora. La respuesta de Willy Toledo Hernand, sin embargo, no ha sido la única que tenía algo que decir sobre el alegato contra "este feminismo de ahora" de la actriz. El también actor Willy Toledo ha criticado las palabras de Maura a través de la red social X: "Que dice la Maura que feminismo pero sin molestar a los hombres y que muchísimas denuncias falsas". Que dice la Maura que feminismo pero sin molestar a los hombres y que muchísimas denuncias falsas. https:\/\/t.co\/kUeFTY7VKp — Guillermo Toledo (@guillermoTM1959) December 23, 2023 Esta no es la primera vez que Carmen Maura critica a el movimiento feminista y que pone en duda a las víctimas. De hecho, en 2019 ya cargó contra sus compañeras de profesión que denunciaron agresiones sexuales: "De todas las del cine que dicen que las han violado, me creo a la mitad" , dijo en una entrevista.

author: Mahima Sharma
title: Hanuman Chalisa: Best Time, Benefits, Right Way to Chant, and Mistakes to Avoid | - Times of India
text: Hanuman Chalisa is most sacred holy hymn or prayer which is chanted by a large number of devotees. This holy hymn is dedicated to honour Lord Hanuman and by chanting this sacred prayers, people seek blessings of Hanuman Ji. This sacred hym is written by Goswami Tulsidas Ji. It has 40 couplets or chaupai and considered as one of the most powerful prayer.It is believed that chanting Hanuman Chalisa is one of the easiest way to appease Lord Hanuman and to seek his blessings. Devotees who wants to seek blessings of Hanuman Ji, recite this on a daily basis by following some rules and correct guidelines. Hanuman Chalisa has a great religious significance and has numerous benefits from giving protection to all the devotees to removing all types of problems and obstacles and it also cures serious health ailments if chanted properly and with full devotion. Lord Hanuman Ji is the symbol of power, courage, and strength and it is believed that devotees who worship him with immense devotion and dedication and chant Hanuman Chalisa daily, they get relieved from all types of sufferings and lead a happy and healthy life. Lord Hanuman also provide guidance in various manners so that they can live a happy life. Let's now talk about the benefits of chanting Hanuman Chalisa:1. NightmaresDevotees who encounter nightmares frequently are advised to chant Hanuman Chalisa regularly to get rid of the bad dreams. 2. Removes Obstacles Recitation of Hanuman Chalisa helps in removing the obstacles come in your way. 3. ProtectionRegular recitation of Hanuman Chalisa gives protection to the devotees.4. Anxiety or DepressionPeople who are suffering from anxiety and depression, must chant Hanuman Chalisa daily at the same time. 5. Hidden enemies Chanting of Hanuman Chalisa helps to remove hidden enemies. 6. Positive AuraChanting on a regular basis purifies the surroundings and fosters harmony and positivity around the devotee.7. Increase ConcentrationChanting with complete devotion and focus means concentrating on the words and their meaning.8. Evil energyIf you want to get rid of evil spirits then recitation of Hanuman Chalisa is beneficial for you. Lord Hanuman helps to get rid of the evils and spirits.Hanuman Chalisa: Rules to follow1. Chant it at night, not in the morning. (It is noticed that that chanting at Bramhamurat (3:30–4:30 AM) is advised. While this is true, devotees can also chant in the evening since Hanuman ji is in tapasya himself of Shri Ram until sunset.2. Prior to reciting Hanuman Chalisa, always chant Ram Naam 108 times.3. While reciting the Hanuman Chalisa, keep an idol or picture of Hanuman ji in front of you.4. Light a diya with desi ghee and then start chanting.5. The Hanuman Chalisa does not require hurried reading; each word should be pronounced loudly and clearly.6. Even if you remember it, you should always read it from a book.7. Keep a glass of water close by because chanting the Chalisa is said to cause vibrations in the area around it. Once you have read and completed the Chalisa, you can consume the vibration that was absorbed by water because it is absorbent and contains memory.
